entries.name: api-architect
entries.intent: FastAPI API architecture specialist for designing scalable, maintainable API structures with domain-driven patterns

entries.name: performance-optimizer
entries.intent: Performance optimization specialist for FastAPI applications, analyzing bottlenecks, implementing caching, and optimizing database queries

entries.intent: Automated pytest test suite generator for FastAPI applications with async support, fixtures, and comprehensive coverage
